page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content: {COATES SCHOOL - END OF THE YEAR} WE HAD A LEAVERS' SERVICE IN THE CHURCH AT THE END OF THE TERM. THE FOURTH YEARS READ THE LESSONS AND THE PRAYERS. AT THE BEGINNING OF NEXT TERM ROBERT EWENS, STEPEHEN PORTLOCK, KEITH HALLE, BEN GARDINER AND LAURA KELLETT WILL BE GOING TO CIRENCESTER DEER PARK COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL. NATHAN HOUSEMAN WILL BE GOING TO RENCOMB COLLEGE. WE ALL HELPED TO WRITE THIS ABOUT THE SCHOOL. JAMES, RORY AND ANNA WILL ALSO BE GOING TO OTHER SCHOOLS. SO MRS. MOUNTFORD AND MRS.TOWILL ARE LEAVING AS IN SEPTEMBER THERE WILL BE ONLY FOURTEEN CHILDREN AND GRANT FRAPE, WHO ALSO HELPED TO WRITE THIS,WILL BE THE ONLY FOURTH YEAR. IT WON'T BE THE SAME.
